website_summaries.verdict: The good choice for the convenience of a handheld and stick vacuum without the cords.
pros: The ultimate flexibility of having both a stick-style vacuum and a handheld vac in one
Cordless design, powerful suction, and LED corner lighting make this a great multi-purpose choice
cons: The battery lasts up to 23 minutes during uninterrupted cleaning, which might not be enough for some people, but the base recharges it automatically

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance, battery lasts long enough.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 2-in-1 vacuum to replace my old corded Navigator because it is too heavy on my wrist. This one is almost the lightest from my search. The suction power is strong enough to pick up my cat’s hair on the carpet so I am very satisfied. I usually finish cleaning 3 bedrooms and a living room, with the battery indicating light still in the middle so that’s good too. I also use the handheld vacuum to clean my car. Overall a fairly good experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: fang yuan

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS, GOOD SUCTION POWER, EASY TO MOVE AROUND
customer_reviews.text: PROS: This vacuum has excellent suction power on floor even with the ECO mode, and I can tell it works good on carpets too because after I used it on my heavy rug for just a few minutes, the dust container had collected a shocking amount of hair/fabrics already. The battery time is just enough for daily house cleaning, and the ability to leave it on the charging base is absolutely a plus - you never need to wonder whether it is charged or not. CONS: Can’t think of any at this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyu Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Vaccum for daily cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I use this vacuum to clean up my entire house including the garage, in a single charge. The suction power is quite stable through the job, which is really good because my old vacuum slowly loses its power as the bettery drains out. The handheld part comes with an extension tool, to help cleaning corners, and small spaces hard to reach. So far I have no issue at all with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with my Roomie Cordless!
customer_reviews.text: Great cordless vacuum! Was so simple to put it together right out of the box. Charged it up and was ready to go. Works like a charm. It's lightweight with great suction. I love that it has a light (my old one didn't have that feature). In fact, I recently broke a glass candle holder which splintered all over my floor. So I whipped out my Roomie and put it to a real test as I wanted to make sure every tiny piece was picked up and it did it! Using the vac first and then the handheld. I was actually surprised at how well it got everything! Cleaning it is also incredibly straightforward and easy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bratella

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly a powerhouse but I like it, good for light jobs and when you don't feel like hauling a vac upstairs. Detachable unit is very handy, charges easily. Battery life seems good, not much of a dust capacity but thats part of the tradeoff getting something so portable and light. Just know going in that you are not going to be pulling out sheep wool from a thick rug with this thing, it has its limitations and cannot be the only vac in a house but nice secondary vac.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Picks up dirt and debris from my high ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Picks up dirt and debris from my high pile carpets, low pile carpets, and vinyl plank floors without damaging them! Light weight and easy to manuever.
customer_reviews.author: Makeshia Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love it.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son.....he loves it. Easy to use, charges fast, fair capacity and light helps!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love this! We just moved in to our new ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We just moved in to our new house and are a little overwhelmed with the wood floors showing all the dog and people hair. We use this vacuum at least 3x a day and it works great! We have a restaurant and we are excited to buy one for the restaurant as well! Give this product a try! I bought it because it was an 'Amazon Choice"!! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonchu1

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect to use when you have surprised guest over
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH, WHERE DO I BEGIN?! My family and I use this every single day. It charges very quickly and works so very well. It is perfect to use when you have surprised guest over. There are two levels; regular and stronger. Regular is perfect for tile or wood floor. You can use stronger for carpet or rugs to make sure that you pick up every speck of dirt or dust, even the ones stuck. It is also very easy to empty out and clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Walzak

customer_reviews.title: Works great on wood flooring
customer_reviews.text: We put new flooring in our home and wanted something easy to use to clean it. This vacuum works great for us, really sucks up everything on the floor. Floor looks clean but afterwards it is amazing what it gets. We use it weekly (for the last 6 weeks) on about 300 SqFt floor and the carpeted steps going downstairs to the garage. No issue with battery life. Ease on and off of the hand held unit.
customer_reviews.author: mwm

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum if you have indoor cats.
customer_reviews.text: I received this vacuum last week and it has surpassed expectations. We have hardwood floors and area carpeting throughout. The vacuum handles the changing surfaces without a problem. We bought this vacuum because we have two cats that like to spread kitty litter. This vacuum picks up the litter with no problem even at the edges of the carpeting when changing from hardwood to carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Papo

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for car and pet hair and stairs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty light weight 3 suction modes has three different lights to let you know charge level also easily detachable push of a button the smart charger system is pretty good because it saves the battery so you don't overcharge it. By far one of the best vacuums I've used in and out of the kitchen for car floorboards and the stairs and all my pet hair. Also it has really bright LEDs on the front of it so if you want to vacuum in the middle of the night that's there.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and affordable cordless wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week but absolutely love the light weight! Battery seems to last as advertised and it works really well on cleaning up hardwood and carpeted areas. The hand-vac feature is a great added bonus for a quick clean up in hard to reach places with just one click. Also quick & easy to dump out debri collected. Overall a great addition to my arsenal of cleaning equipment and my favorite go to gadget for cleaning up after my 4 yr old granddaughter. Very happy with this affordable cordless convenience!
customer_reviews.author: Diane A.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this vacuum. It is so light and easy to use. The vacuum arrived quickly and was very easy to assemble. I just plugged it in and in no time it was ready to use. . This glides along smoothly on hard wood or linoleum floors picks up all my dog and cat hair never missing any. I would not want to do a lot of carpet with it but for the usual throw rug it does a fine job. The small hand held device is very handy for the stairs and in those hard to reach corners. I have to wonder why I have not purchased this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this. It’s light weight-Update! 😕
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. It’s light weight, hand held and floor vac. Does great on tile and floor rug. Only wish it would flatten down enough to go under tables or beds. Update- it started to not work 6 months in. It shows fully charged but will shut off as soon as you turn it on. The hand held will work if you take it off the unit the vacuum itself won’t. I have fully cleaned all pieces, and tried different outlets and made sure it is connecting on the stand. Very disappointed. It’s basiclly useless now.
customer_reviews.author: S & T

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!  Great vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this Vacuum. It arrived earlier than expected which was a plus. I love everything about it, from the swivel brush, to the hand vac, to the folding it in half (saves space), to the accessory, to being lightweight, easy to clean and the price was great. The biggest reason I love it? BEST CLEANER I have ever had. Don't be afraid to take a risk because you are not familiar with the name. You will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Not all it is cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get my new vacuum cleaner, however it only worked for a few months and then died on me. The vacuum didn't work that well either, we do have. Hairy dog but it wouldn't get up any of his fur. My husband and I gave up and just bought a cheap dust devil for $40 and it works a million times better than this product ever did! So please do NOT by this vacuum you can get much cheaper one that WORKS for much less money.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harvey

customer_reviews.title: You’re better off using your hard earned money as a dust pan.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had tried to return this before my wife threw it in the garbage. We began having problems with the charging base within months of purchase. While it worked okay at first, the base wore quickly. Placement of the vacuum in the base wore the support as well as the charging prongs. I wish I had never bought this. Truly a disappointment and missed opportunity to produce a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: mntnpeak

customer_reviews.title: the first thing I like that it very light
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it, the first thing I like that it very light , and both the hand vaccume and the big one so I can use it to clean after my kids, and I loved when I read from the questions about it’s buttery that if damaged or so , can be replaced Total of all I loved it ...
customer_reviews.author: Shery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light cleanups!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Roomie, and it was so easy to assemble! (Great packaging by the way). Lightweight, with swivel head works as expected on both hard and soft surfaces. Brushes are softer than others I have had...a better adaptation for hard floors I think, but doesn't pick up sticky things on carpets as well. Suction is sufficient for the light job cleanups it is designed for.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shine

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT -- and I can't stress this enough -- buy this vacuum. It only worked for about six months before it quit charging all together and now its completely useless. It doesn't have good suction power so it won't clean carpets well (especially if you have pets). The description says it runs about 20 minutes when fully charged and since I have a small apartment, I figured that would be plenty of time, but it rarely was. This product is just so cheaply made and a COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartments
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum that does so much. I live in a 750 sq apartment, mostly hardwood floors with a large cat condo. This vacuum is perfect as it not only keeps my apartment clean, it keeps my cats condo clean too! It charges super fast and keeps the charge for several cleanings. It’s the best. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Best money I have spent. I have bad back and cannot use large vacuums. This one, I can use between times that I have someone else clean. Use on both carpet and tile.
customer_reviews.author: Nnml.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for carpet, cannot replace a traditional vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this vacuum. Pros: -super lightweight -set up was exceptionally easy -easy to maneuver -slim and stores easily -looks nice -hand held piece is easy to use -controls are intuitive Cons -suction power is low even on the high setting -dust pan holds very little (had to empty halfway through use of the 600 square feet I vacuumed) -needs to be stored near an outlet (which not a lot of closets have) -handheld suction is also somewhat weak -not great on carpet but pretty good on wood & tile.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & efficient!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no assembly, it is so compact..takes up minimal space, plenty of power for my rugs & carpeting. I was so tired of pushing my name brand upright around, and not getting around things easily. This vacuum is powerful, lightweight and I used the handheld part to clean out my car. I am going to buy another for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: martha pyles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an alternative to constantly sweeping our hardwood floors and it is perfect! I wouldn't buy for carpet however for hardwood it is absolutely perfect, plenty of power and the rotating brushes make sure no dirt is left behind. The stand which also doubles as a charger is as convenient as it gets. There are 2 power settings and at the high setting there is plenty of suction. Setup was easy and the packaging was first class. I highly recommend for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hillsborough

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of different cordless vacs over the years. The Roomie Tec is easily the best of the bunch. Assembly is very quick, it works great on cleaning up after pets who are constantly shedding, and the headlights are a really good aid for finding dirt you didn't even know was there. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R.F. Burns

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: Received product and let it charge for five hours after I took it out of box. When I went to use for first time, there was power and brush roll turned but vacuum motor never worked. Detached hand held unit from stick could see power light on but motor never turned on and no suction at all. Had to repack and return. Decided to go with a different brand. Company must not check products before packing and shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, easy to assemble, ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Just received, but so far so good. Feature I like most over my last Electrolux (9 yrs before the switches started to fail!) is that it stands up on its own, both in and out of the charger—no more deafening crashes. The hand held does pop quite quickly out of the stick, so use a hand to catch while pressing the release button . Only reason I gave it 4 * is because of the length of use so far. My husband drilled a hole in the floor to plug it in an outlet in the basement. I hate to see cleaning tools out of closets. Hoping it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: carol king

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum has stoped working already, I only had it 3 months. Power cord gets very hot I believe it is not charging. I’m very disappointed as this was not a cheap item.
customer_reviews.author: Talesha

customer_reviews.title: Can get anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can pull it from its charging station and go. So far, battery life has been fine. Cleaning out the cup has been easy too. Things I don't like: I've had issues pulling the "dustbuster" out of the overall vacuum frame. Sometimes it takes a little work to set it properly into the charger. Both of these are easy enough to deal with. I really like being able to do some quick cleanups of pet hair and everyday dirt without dragging a cord behind me.
customer_reviews.author: keep it simple

customer_reviews.title: The lightweight cordless vacuum I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lightweight vacuum. I needed a way to vacuum patio and outdoor carpet around an inground pool. There’s no electric outlet on the other side of pool. This worked well to vacuum up the small dirt and pollen particles that come in through the screened in room. It’s easy to clean the canister and filters which is perfect for the pollen and dust. Has enough pickup power and charged quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: although it is probably fine for that as well
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works well and my sister loves the pull out hand held feature for the stairs and furniture. The only reason I gave 4 stars is it is a very light weight vacuum. I am using it for hardwood floors and area carpets. I have a second vacuum for my carpeted house upstairs, although it is probably fine for that as well. But it charges well and the charge lasts for as long as we need it. Very nice vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this vacuum cleaner after reading the reviews I thought this is the one. Well...it's going back. Save your money don't order this vacuum. After owning a Dyson I purchased this as a second vacuum for my second floor. Nothing beats a Dyson. Pros : It's Cordless. You have an option for a hand held vacuum. Cons: No suction power what so ever. It has 2 speeds one low one high there both very weak. You need to go over your floor a couple of times to pick up items. Battery life no so great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarandis K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working In Less Than A Year
customer_reviews.text: The smaller insert still works but the floor attachment has stopped working entirely. It first stopped working a few months after purchase. I emailed for support and they told me it frequently gets clogged so to really clean out the bottom attachment in between cleanings. I began to be very thorough cutting out the hair and cleaning the attachment. However it has now stopped working entirely now even though it has nothing stuck in it. When I press the power button, it comes on for one second, then shuts off and blinks the charge button. It is charged and the small insert part still works if I remove it. Really disappointed with this product and don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Roomie Tec Vacuum NOT SO GOOD OF DEAL.
customer_reviews.text: So far this Roomie Tec vacuum works as advertised. Built good and simple to use. Will keep you posted to see after a few weeks/months the quality and battery life. UPDATE: This vacuum started out strong. Now unit sounds like it is going to explode when turned on. Seems like it's made to work just long enough for the warranty to run out. Will keep new update if customer service contacts and cares.
customer_reviews.author: Review Monster.(☆=?)

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a year
customer_reviews.text: I started out liking this vacuum. I have dark hardwood floors and three dogs. The suction power was good. But unfortunately the light stopped working. This is an important feature for me. The manufacturer gave me all kinds of things to try to fix it but no success. They want me to send it to them in Canada but the cost to do so isn’t worth the cost of the vacuum. I only bought this in January. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 months and won’t work! Update: new one sent.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 5 months. The lights started to flicker. Then I noticed that when the lights flickered and stopped working that meant the roller brush also stopped working. Now it doesn’t work at all! I only used it to clean up kitty litter and cat hair on hard floors and thin throw rugs. Update: I emailed them and they sent me a new one for no charge and didn’t ask me to send them the old one. The new one is working well!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harp-Rouser

customer_reviews.title: okay colorless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is lightweight and easy to maneuver. It goes into tight places. I like that it is quieter than other vacuums. It is so easy to move the vacuum around for vacuuming apartment. However the small vac is not easy too put back together as it does not align easily.
customer_reviews.author: Skiler

customer_reviews.title: Very Short Life!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this electric broom! About one month ago it started to be really hard to charge. You had to get it in just the perfect spot after trying numerous times. Well yesterday we could not get it to charge at all so it is useless. I am giving it two stars because it work very nicely for 4 short months. It was just used in the home a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: P. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Clogs Easy
customer_reviews.text: Picks up amazing pushing forward, doesn't scatter dirt. Use it once or twice and that's where trouble begins. Dog hair gets wrapped around the filter and clogs the suction cup and access port at the bottom. It's simple to take filter out and clean it but you need a stiff wire to run through the access port at the bottom of the unit. The whole process is 6-10 minute process every time you use it. Fast forward 9 months later and the push button tabs that hold the suction cup around the filter is sticking. Now everytime you take the handheld out the whole thing falls apart and dirt goes every where. Time to trash this one.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have to share! I have a Electrolux floor and small rug area vacuum. For every day! It finally died. I ordered two floor vacuums from Amazon to see which one would work better for every day. I was looking for light weight, great suction easy to swivel around corners, pick up cat litter, and get under the kitchen cabinets. This little thing for $99 is amazing. Suction is unbelievable, no assembly required, you plug it in, it charges and the charge will last for about 30 to 40 minutes easily. Don’t even bother looking for anything else. I’m so excited that I found this one. Look no further !!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Powerful cordless!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum so far. I have a free range bunny so there's always hair to vacuum up on the hardwood floor and low pile area rugs. It really has great suction (compared to others I've tried) even on the rug and pulls up all my pets hair. Been using for a couple of weeks now and very happy. I tried a Chinese brand before this and it stopped working well within a week. This one though is definitely a keeper though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this vacuum daily to keep up with my dog hair, and cat litter that scatter the floors. Unlike some of the other stick vacuums, this one really DOES pick up cat litter. The charging stand is very convenient. I went from an Electrolux Ergorapido, to this, and it is MUCH better!! The roller doesn't always pop off on the bottom, you can vacuum rugs with it, and it is much sturdier! Also, the Electrolux charger kept breaking (I replaced it 3 times), and this convenient stand does not have that issue. I am very happy with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I had stroke and need an easy to use light weight unit because the right hand ...
customer_reviews.text: the instruction manual is too cryptic;I had stroke and need an easy to use light weight unit because the right hand is paralyzed. trying to remove the section containing the dirt to empty it was tricky-- but putting it back was really a challenge --it was hard to keep it assembled in order to put it back in the vacuum.I wish it was better designed..recharging is also a hassle because of the time required.But it does pick up the dog and cat hair well.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Jew

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum in April after much research and reading of reviews. I was happy with it but in September it stopped charging so it's been standing there collecting dust. Funny thing is that I only used it about 20 times ever. I expected it to last a bit longer, especially after paying over one hundred dollars. I have read they will replace the battery/vacuum. I'm hoping I will be reached out to regarding this matter. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: We have one lab and two cats and I have had trouble keeping up with the hair between vacuuming. This vacuum is just great, I buzz it around and you can't believe how much hair it picks up. My daughter had one and brought it over to show me. I used it and bought my own same day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction and battery
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner has very poor suction. The charge dies really fast, before you finish you job, and your cleaning will get delayed. I don’t approve my purchase at all. I would like to return it, but I cannot find the link for returning it. After reading positive comments, I decided to give it a try. If you want to clean 75% of the carpet, buy it. This item does not suck everything, like I said very poor suction.
customer_reviews.author: One&only

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. I rent a large room so regular size vacuums are too big for the space I have. Plus I have a dog that sheds a and this vacuum handles fur no problem. I love the fact that it's wireless, amazing and I use it to clean my car as well. The only thing I don't like about this is dumping th3dirt I wish was a bit easier or cleaner way.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to use I am so obsessed with using this vacuum it picks up all of my animals hair and anything on the floor I feel it’s better than my regular vacuum only problem a few months and it stopped working I was so upset because I love it so much I contacted the company and they sent me a new piece with no problem only thing it took a while for it to come in that was a little upsetting I just really hope it doesn’t stop working again . Because it is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and just hoped it was not like the others. I am so glad I gave this item a try; it is not like the others. The vacuum works well from picking up dust to cleaning an entire Carpet area. The suction is great, and cleaning after is even better. Pulling trash front eh rollers is easy, and you just don’t have that feeling of I can use this once or twice, and then it not be any good. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: T White

customer_reviews.title: Great dust buster /w light vacuuming capability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little dust buster, with an easy to clean bin. The charging stand, plus the (lithium?) battery used, make this far more convenient than my old one which wold lose it's charge standing around. I've accidentally left this guy off the charger for as long as a month at a time, and the charge remains essentially right where I left it. The stick mode works great for picking up crumbs and light debris/dust from the kitchen and other hard surfaces. It can also pick up surface dirt from carpet with ease (ie: crumbs, powder) for a quick cleaning, but of course can't match the power of a traditional vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Digicrat

customer_reviews.title: Overall effectiveness.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is of good quality and appears durable. My only complaint is that although it provides plenty of suction, the brushes are so soft they frequently fail to scoop up even the smallest items like bread-crumb scraps and tiny pieces of peanut shells. That's even the case on carpets where brushes are normally effective at 'sweeping' tiny scraps back inside the collector. The brushes appear to be made from a very soft material, almost like hair, as opposed to strong bristles. I'm thinking of trying to substitute my own home-made brushes using those in my older cordless-vacuum this Roomie Tec is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Christian

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, Very light, powerful that your kids would love too..!
customer_reviews.text: Cant expect lighter than this. Even my 3 yr old wants to clean his house now. Whenever he feels bored, he will just grab the vacuum cleaner from its holder and starts cleaning. When done, he will keep it back on its charger. It is soooo light. It has almost become his new toy. Flexible, Very light, powerful, nice architecture(every parts can be easily dissembled and assembled at will). The flexibility helps in cleaning all nook and corner of not only the house but your car too..
customer_reviews.author: siddhartha pulluru

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The suction could be better, and it doesn’t stand well alone off the stand. I do love the mobility, and the handheld feature **After 3 uses, the vacuum stopped working. It starts then a minute later the top light of the battery life indicator starts blinking. *** The Roomie support will stall your time until your warranty is up. It took a little over a week for them to compromise to send a replacement roller (when the problem is obviously not with a roller that was only used 3 times). This was May 29. The support member informed me it will take 20-30 business days (it is June 22), and the new roller has not arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little vacuum with great suction.
customer_reviews.text: Thought we would just use this for small clean up around the cat's litter box. Found it to work great on our couch and chairs, the various carpets, and even the bed cover. It doesn't get real hungry and attempt to suck everything up, rather, it is well behaved, and switches between power settings nicely. Little bugger is even a breeze to clean. Love the fact that the caddy is also the charging station. Honestly, this works a whole lot better than the previous incarnations we tried. Oh, "it ain't heavy" swivels nicely and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Updated...Decent for the price, their customer service is better
customer_reviews.text: Update!!!! I had a great experience with their CS team and when they found out they sent me a new one. CHanged my 1 star to a 3 for their CS work. I have had this less than 5 months, thought it looked okay, but now it will not even charge. Lights up charger lights, says its charged, then take it off the charger and it does not work. I have fully cleaned it, so there are no obstructions. Buy a more expensive one and dont waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: A Man

customer_reviews.title: Not for you.  Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum only lasted 3 1/2 months before the switch to the power head broke. This is when the front tips down and the lights and roller are supposed to work. Also, after about 2 months it was extremely difficult to replace the filter for emptying the dust collector and closing the thing back up. Very poor design. What I am sure makes the company happy is most people do not have the time and/or want to deal with hassle of returning it. (I did get a 3 year extended warranty from Walmart when I bought a SHARK to replace this vacuum). You get what you pay for once again. No idea how this vacuum got so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Bjornsen

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box. The device was really easy to set up and use. Easy to navigate too. Emptying the cannister is a little weird, I couldn't get the filter to align again after I emptied it out but I finally got it back together. I bought this so we would have an extra vac for upstairs and it works well enough. Not as powerful as my regular vac but it's got enough suction to do the job. I also purchased this so we have a hand held vac for our cars. Haven't tried it yet but I think it will work just fine. Overall, quite good value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna301

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for a pet filled house
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the ideal vacuum for a house with 3 cats and a German Shepherd. It worked great for the first week but then it seemed to just give up and barely picked up anything. I cleaned every nook and cranny on this thing hoping it just needed a good clean to get back to its useful self but no. I strongly believe that this vacuum would do better in a house with no pets.
customer_reviews.author: A_N

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's light and quiet. The battery lasts for a very long time. However, it is a cordless stick vacuum, and value priced at that. Do not expect the same performance you would get from a name brand corderd full size vacuum. Great for everyday, and quick clean up. UPDATE: I frequently have to remove the brush to extract a kitten sized wad of cat hair. Again, it's great for quick surface jobs. You will still want a full sized machine for deep cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Good things come on small packages.
customer_reviews.text: So far, this thing is great. It is easily outperforming my plug-in vacuum that its replacing. Battery life on normal cycle is 20+ minutes. You can take your time while vacuuming a 2700sq feet home and still get the job done. I am impressed by the SUCTION. It's something lacking with most vacuums these days-they tend to try to use their brushes to sweep things towards the weak suction, as opposed to having good overall suction as the main tool for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I have all pergo flooring which I love, but with 2 dogs and a mostly sand ...
customer_reviews.text: I have all pergo flooring which I love, but with 2 dogs and a mostly sand yard, my house is constantly needing to be vacuumed. I love the cordless. I use my roomie every day, it sucks up my dogs fur no problem, and is super light. It isn’t obnoxiously loud. The bagless cannister comes apart super easy to clean out the filter and such. This was a very good purchase for our home. I recommend it!!! Spilled soil everywhere, it handled the mess like a champ. Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hardwood/ceramic floors
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for what we bought it for - vacuuming hardwood/ceramic floors of dog hair, dust, and dirt. We have also used it successfully on somewhat thin smooth rugs.The lights are bright and really show exactly what is on your floor so you can vacuum it up. Kinda horrified me to see what I was missing 😜 Emptying the canister is simple and the dog hair was in a nice compact shape. Very lightweight, easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: It_Is_Me

customer_reviews.title: Used it today and this thing is the best it doesn’t take up any space and I LOVE ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new vacuum cleaner and I wanted one that could work hard wood and carpet and I also wanted a detachable hand cleaner I have a rabbit and she sheds all over my couch. Used it today and this thing is the best it doesn’t take up any space and I LOVE that it’s cordless that was also something I was looking for and it does the job right!!! Also if something goes wrong with the vacuum then getting a new one is fairly easy with contacting the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kellianne Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with a powerful intake
customer_reviews.text: When I first pulled it out of the box, I thought it would be junk because it feels so light. However, I charged it up and I couldn't be more impressed with the intake power. The only thing I would change is the rubber bumper because it doesn't allow me to glide around the perimeter of the cabinet lined kitchen since the rubber catches on the wood. Other than that, it's a great vacuum for touch up jobs between deep clean days whether working on carpets or hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: EmmSt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well on my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: i like this very much. Easy to assemble and already had some charge so I tried it out. Works great! I was able to sweep my small living room, dining room, hall, and bedroom. Picks up dust and body powder very well. I like that it has 2 speeds. I like the lights as it shows just where the dust is so I can sweep. It swivels nicely and gets under the edge of my bed. It's not heavy and is easy to maneuver. i love that it sits out of the way on it's charger so it's always ready when I need it. I also like that I can remove and use the hand-held dust buster.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a year later not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Feb 2018 and loved it. Now it won't hold a charger and no longer works. Sad face. Bought 2nd one, months later will not hold a charge. Exchanged it, same thing with #3. Its a good unit when it works but I'll never take a chance on this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard floors
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with this. Cordless feature is super convenient and it does well enough for the tile floors, low pile area rug and vinyl plank I have. I use a different vacuum for the carpet that is more powerful. I use this unit for lighter daily cleaning of dust bunnies, hair or small leaves brought in at the doors. Being able to detach the handheld part comes in handy at times. The only thing I find awkward is after emptying the canister, it is difficult to align the inner filter to get it to close properly. I think they could design the plastic to fit better. For the price, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago after having moved into an apartment with predominately laminate floors. With two cats that shed a ton and leave litter EVERYWHERE, this little vac was a godsend (I hate sweeping). The suction isn't stellar when it comes to picking up the litter, but if you go over the same spot a couple of times, it will usually do the trick. All in all, very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Really Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: This has been a disappointment since I purchased it. It is basically useless on tile floors for things like cat litter or crumbs. As soon as I turn it off it also drops a ton of whatever I'm cleaning back in the floor. I've kept it for the year since I bought it for my carpeted stairs, which it was doing an ok job of between sessions of my hauling my big vacuum up and down the stairs. However, it seems to have finally given up, which isn't really much of a step down from where it started.
customer_reviews.author: UsernameIrrelevant

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! So easy to use! Cleans really well, convenient, charges well. It even looks nice to keep out. It is very versatile. I use it a few times every day. Works for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Stone

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst cordless vacuum I have ever purchased. On short napped carpet the beater brush binds and bounces and it cleans very poorly. It is my fault I didn't return it when I first recieved it, but I thought it might improve with use,I finally refuse to torture myself any longed.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Williams.

customer_reviews.title: The Roomie vacuums real problem are...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum worked nicely at first but within several weeks the lights on the the vacuum head started to fail, and having the lights were the reason why I bought the Vacuum over other models. The dirt container is rather small and must be emptied often. It’s pick up power is just good enough to get by but doesn’t pick up anything to big. Overall I would not recommend it. But for the money it’s an ok deal if you can’t afford a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great portable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered did not hold a charge but customer service was great at getting me a replacement. New one works great and doesn't take up much space at all. Great for quick cleaning and love the detachable hand vac for couch or stair cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, relatively quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: This stick vacuum has the qualities listed in the title. I had one small issue with the product and solved it myself. The device wasn't easy to remove from the charging cradle. However, I had to file a bit the walls around the metal charging contacts until they were flush with the contacts, cleaned them and then used WD40 on them. Now the stick vacuum releases just right.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great for Lightwork
customer_reviews.text: I have hard wood floors and some area rugs. This vacumn works very well on hardwood and does a pretty decent job on most area rugs on the high setting. The handheld portion of it seems to not do as well in picking up dog hair but does well picking up loose small objects. If you have a small house/apartment this should serve you quite well Pros: Battery Life Light weight Handling Charging station Cons: Suction can be weak on some area rugs Feels slightly cheap and breakable Handheld is ok
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever cordless vacuum so I am super stoked about that!!! I love that I can vacuum every room in my home without needing to worry about the wire and outlet.. I can go upstairs and downstairs with no problems since it is so light. I use this vacuum on hardwood and porcelain tile floors and it does a great job! Also the handheld little carrier is so easy to use on my stairs which I can further appreciate since I have a bad back. Charges quick! Tucks away in my closet nicely!
customer_reviews.author: SASSY

customer_reviews.title: The answer to my prayers.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to pick up the tons of hair shedded from my 50 lb dog. Great for hardwood, tile, and laminate. Easily maneuverable on stairs. Even picks up hair from short pile rugs. Keeps a charge and stores away nicely. So glad I made this purchase. It sure beats breaking out the big vacuum or broom and dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy this because I had never heard of the brand, however, after reading the customer reviews I decided to give it a try. I'm so happy with this vacuum as it has great suction power and very light weight. It is great to have the handheld piece right in the unit so all you have to do is click a button and the handheld comes right out and ready to use. More importantly is that this vacuum is SO easy to clean out!! I would absolutely recommend this product to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE. Yes it’s cheap and yes it works (when it wants to). Mine stays on the charger. I clean out the dust buster before every use. And the filter. And the filter pad. I turn it in to vacuum a room and it dies in 15 seconds. Save your $100 and buy a better vacuum. I promise you I’m regretting my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for me
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for me. I am elderly and widowed so lightweight, cordless convenience, no bags to buy, handiness of handheld vacuum. So far so good on reliability and run time on battery quite adequate. Vacuum power does the job along with the rotating brush bar. Price was right. I did buy an extended warranty, but because of the solidness of this product, I am thinking I won't need to exercise the warranty. if after just 3 or 4 years down the road, it broke down, I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Happy vacuumed
customer_reviews.text: I live in a townhouse, half carpet, half hard wood. Roomie is versatile, no cord to get twisted and lightweight. Initially I was doubtful. Unpacking, it seemed plastic-y, small and too light to do the job. Wrong. It took me minutes to race around all levels and removed the hand vac to hit the carpeted stairs. Very satisfied. Easy to remove the debris and voila done. It charged quickly and did not feel rushed to save charge. The price was fair but discounted on Amazon. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: a s ames

customer_reviews.title: 3 settings for the strength
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this vacuum would work this well!!! Easy to clean, every parts can be dissemble and put back easily. My down pillow broke and I notice even the smallest dust can be picked up. I have allergies to dusts and I definitely sneezed less after this vacuum. Won’t spend money on overpriced Dyson after this purchase. Update: after 4 months of light use, the light went one and off, feel like something inside is not have connection problem. And I tried on tile also, doesn’t work as good as on wood or carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Roomie to replace an Electrolux Ergorapido. The Roomie is significantly lighter than the Ergorapido and slightly quieter. I haven't used the Roomie a lot since receiving it as it's just for light vacuuming my kitchen (travertine tile), laundry area in garage (indoor-outdoor carpet), and patio (travertine tile) floors in-between house cleaning. So far it's doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: robeliot

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM I HAVE EVER OWNED!
customer_reviews.text: This little one is so strong!!! It is so light and easy to maneuver, bends under stuff, and suctions everything! Works AMAZING on hardwood, as well as decent on carpet. I needed this for mostly hardwood, but didn't want to have to switch vacuums for the one room that has carpet, and this is PERFECT! Cordless feature is a game changer! Also, so nice that the center comes out to do small pick ups. Taller carpet is the hardest for this little one to do, however, it still gets some stuff out of tall carpet.
customer_reviews.author: crodriguez2015

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: RUN AWAY FROM THIS. The initial use - though battery charge was really short - worked well enough. Second time? Hadn’t charged despite being on the charger and the charging light flashing. We’ve tried to use it three more times (for a total of five uses since we bought it at the end of March 2020) and it will not suck *anything* up. Hair wraps around the rotator literally two seconds after starting up then you’re unable to do anything. The Worst Vacuum I have *ever* used.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Bad Canadian company, terrible vacuum sweeper!👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Horrible vacuum! Next to impossible to set in recharger, ten to fifteen attempts not unusual. This is our second one, first was okay enough to get the second. Then the LED LIGHTS quit working on junior one. They are made in Canada, their customer service is terrible. They said they would ship warranty replacement parts two months ago. They say because it is coming from Canada it could take a month, it has been two months, no parts, and when I ask about they DO NOT RESPOND TO MY MESSAGES!!! RUN, RUN, RUN FROM ROOMIE VAC.
customer_reviews.author: rock lover

customer_reviews.title: Very wise purchase. Better than Shark vacs.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best vacuums for gyms Ive had!!!! We use it to spot clean our business gym. We go from carpet, rubber flooring and to linoleum. I like that the tray is close to the suction roller so not much debris gets stuck through the innards. The suction is amazing!! This replaced a fancy Shark cordless vacuum that kept getting stuff stuck through the tube. I love the detachable hand vac. Do your research but Don’t think twice about this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: For being small this Roomie is good. I thought my robot vacuum was doing a good job at keeping cat hair picked up but I used this as soon as it arrived and I was stunned at how much cat hair it got. Love that it picks up litter and cat hair with ease. Not loud, easy to use and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: No customer support after stating there was a one year warranty when you registered.
customer_reviews.text: It started out nice but after about 3 weeks the rollers and lights started cutting in and off. It must have a short somewhere. No way to contact customer service directly - only through their Facebook page. Absolutely no response from the 2 messages I sent. I really liked it up until the point it developed a short.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent services-It broke in 6 months but the company replaced it
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum machine was working well and met my needs but it broke after about 6 months. However, the company did replace the item after I contacted them through Amazon and I received a new vacuum yesterday with UPS. I do appreciate the customer services from this company as they are really trying to make sure they are doing their best for their customers. For this reason alone, I will strongly recommend purchasing products from this company. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bare floors' best friend
customer_reviews.text: This little wonder is lightweight, has two power levels, easily maneuvers under & around things, cleans right up to the edges, has lights to help spot the dirt, and as a bonus has a removable hand vac. It holds a charge so it doesn't have to live on the charger when not in use. I dithered over which vac to buy and my expectations were not only met but greatly exceeded, especially considering the reasonable price. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Minnmac

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum and best Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great cordless vacuum and the customer service is the best you could ever get. We love this vacuum, it has a great suction power and picks up pretty much all the dust and mess from the floor. LED lights on the floor of vacuum frame really helps you see the amount of dust you have in the house. After about a year, we ran into an issue where the roller brush was not spinning but the customer service representative went through a quick couple checks to determine where the issue was and agreed to replace the entire unit at no cost. I absolutely recommend RoomieTec and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addon for a vacuum robot!
customer_reviews.text: We have a vacuum robot who is cleaning our house. But sometimes we just need an option to quickly vacuum one area or spots where the robot does not get to. This vacuum is ideal since it allows regular vacuum and the handheld option. It helped a lot so far and we did not have any trouble with the suction power or battery. I wish the stand cable would be a bit longer or offer hanging the vacuum. This way it just takes space in an area where we can plug it and it is not really a musuem item.
customer_reviews.author: Ana & Philipp

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my third of these little sweepers. The first was pretty much for my craft room and our basement family room area of the house. It worked so well, I ordered one for upstairs. Why three? I just ordered another one for our boat. It's a very efficient and easy to use sweeper. It's not what you need for a deep cleaning, but perfect for the daily messes of life. Having a built-in hand sweeper is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of big and obnoxious vacuum cleaners, and the always horrible experience about the cord getting caught all the time, short or to big; this one is the best solution if you are looking for a light and powerful enough vacuum cleaner; I have a dog and sometimes the loose hair gets out of control inside the apartment, this one is perfect for that. Super easy to store , lightweight, battery last a good amount of time, good suction power, great!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Gil

customer_reviews.title: Has stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in August. Only use it to sweep in front of my door where I track in stuff from the yard. Yesterday the roller completely stopped working and lights also stopped. When I hung it turned OFF back on charger the roller runs non stop! I clean it every time I use it so that can't be the problem. I fear there is a wiring problem or a short someplace which would cause a fire if left on the charger. I have reported it to Amazon and to Roomie tech today. We will see if they will hopefully replace the darn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ncreiner

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: After only two months of use, the Roomie DOES NOT HOLD A CHARGE FOR MORE THAN FIVE SECONDS. I use it for very light duty vacuuming of my kitchen floor, but the Roomie shuts off even though the lights indicate it’s fully charged. It’s constructed of cheap plastic and not at all sturdy. The Roomie is now in my trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money unless you have a clean, childless,  rugless house
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this vacuum. For small crumbs and „dust” it’s okay, however something the size of half a blueberry is difficult for this vacuum to pick up so if my Toddler throws food on the floor i have to pick 95% of it off the floor before i can vacuum. Had it for 6 months and it’s suction is getting worse by the day. Very disappointed in this purchase. I wanted to believe in „brandless” and in this cass, I wish I would have invested in a dyson right away instead of wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

product_meta.title: ROOMIE TEC Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 2 in 1 Handheld Vacuum, High-Power 2200mAh Li-ion Rechargeable Battery, with Corner Lighting and Upright Charging Base
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 Cordless Vacuum -- easily switch upright stick vacuum to handheld vacuum at the touch of a button and tackle trodden-in dirt, dust and debris on furniture, soft furnishings, stairs and car interiors
Powerful Suction -- 2x individual high power motors provides excellent dust pick-up ability on carpet, floor and tile.
Long Lasting Battery -- 2200mAh Lithium battery with up to 23 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning - from just one charge.
6 LED Corner Lighting -- provides excellent lighting under your furnitures.
What You Get -- Roomie "Vincent" cordless vacuum, charging base, AC power adapter, multi-function crevice nozzle, and our instruction manual.
